tool_description: An API showing all the current Crypto Currency data from trending Crypto Currencies to the top Crypto Currencies live and the ability to lookup information on any Crypto Currency out there.
name: Crypto Lightning
title: Crypto Lightning

api_list.name: Get Top 20 Trending Crypto Currencies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the current top 20 Crypto Currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-lightning.p.rapidapi.com/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-lightning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
